head.title: Raff Simms
head.name: Raff Simms
head.description: I'm an undergraduate student from the United Kingdom, currently studying towards a Bachelor of Science (Hons) in Cyber Security.

elements.title: Upload Server
elements.subtext: A web application created using Node.JS that accepts file upload requests and returns a shareable link pointing to the uploaded file.

elements.title: Bind Keylogger
elements.subtext: A remote keylogger application created with Python — capable of handling multiple client connections simultaneously.

elements.title: Social Scanner
elements.subtext: A web application created using Next.JS that checks the availability of usernames on a variety of online platforms.

elements.title: Dynamic WebM
elements.subtext: A simple command line tool written in Python allowing you to create WebM videos that change resolution when played.

elements.title: Nottingham Trent University
elements.subtext: I am currently studying towards a Bachelor of Science (Hons) in Computer Systems (Cyber Security) with supplementary Chinese (Mandarin) — predicted to achieve a First. I am due to complete a year of work experience with Mercedes AMG High Performance Powertrains before graduating in 2025.

elements.title: Derby College
elements.subtext: I completed a Level 3 National Extended Diploma in Computing and Cyber Security — achieving an overall grade of D*D*D. Many computing topics were covered including Programming, System Analysis & Design, Mathematics, Information/Cyber Security, and IT Project Management.
